text.*:
List of heritage railways is a comprehensive listing of heritage railways sorted by country, state or region. A heritage railway is a preserved or tourist railroad which is run as a tourist attraction, is usually but not always run by volunteers, and often seeks to re-create railway scenes of the past.

Europe[edit]

Albania[edit]

The entire remaining rail network of Albania can be considered as a heritage system.

Belgium[edit]

Vertical boiler loco Cockerill on the Dendermonde-Puurs Railway
  • Chemin de Fer à vapeur des Trois Vallées[1]
  • Chemin de Fer du Bocq[2]
  • Dendermonde-Puurs Steam Railway[3]
  • Stoomcentrum Maldegem[4]
  • Vennbahn Closed in 2001

Bosnia and Herzegovina[edit]

  • Sarajevo-Višegrad Railway (section from Višegrad to Vardište)

Denmark[edit]

An NSJV restored train on the Nordsjællands Veterantog
Source: [citation needed]
  • Aabenraa Veteranbane – standard-gauge railway, Jutland
  • Amtsbanen på Als / Ekleinbahn – narrow-gauge railway, Als, re-establish a 6 km section of the railway from Nordborg to Universe (Danish amusement park)
  • Bevaringsforeningen Gedser Remise – roundhouse & standard-gauge railway, Falster, DJK
  • BjergBanen – standard-gauge railway & heritage rail operator, Jylland
  • Blovstrødbanen – narrow-gauge railway, Zealand, DJK
  • Bornholms Railway Museum- narrow gauge, Bornholm, future re establish a section of the former Nexøbane
  • Danish Railway Museum – Funen
  • Dansk Jernbane-Klub – shortened as DJK, several heritage railways & operators are members of DJK
  • Djursland Railway Museum – Jylland, DJK
  • Hanstholm fortress – narrow-gauge railway, Jylland
  • Hedelands Veteranbane – narrow-gauge railway, Sjælland
  • Hjerl Hede Frilandsmuseum – narrow-gauge railway, Jylland
  • Limfjordsbanen – heritage rail operator, Jylland, DJK
  • Mariager-Handest Veteranbane – standard-gauge railway, Jylland, DJK
  • Museumsbanen Maribo-Bandholm – standard-gauge railway, Lolland, DJK
  • MY-Veterantog – heritage rail operator, Sjælland, DJK
  • Nordisk Jernbane-Klub – heritage rail operator, Falster, DJK
  • Nordsjællands Veterantog – heritage rail operator, Sjælland
  • Skjoldenæsholm Tram Museum – near Skjoldenæsholm Castle, Sjælland
  • Stenvad Mosebrugcenter – narrow-gauge railway, Jylland
  • Struer Jernbane-Klub – heritage rail operator, Jylland
  • Struer Railway Museum- Jylland
  • Sydfynske Veteranjernbane – standard-gauge railway, Fyn
  • Sydjyllands Veterantog – heritage rail operator, Jylland
  • Vestsjællands Veterantog – standard-gauge railway, Sjælland, DJK
  • Veteranbanen Bryrup-Vrads – standard-gauge railway, Jylland
  • Veteranbanen Haderslev-Vojens – standard-gauge railway, Jylland, DJK
  • Veterantog Vest – heritage rail operator, Jylland, DJK
  • Videbæk-Skjern Veteranbane – standard-gauge railway, Jylland
  • Østsjællandske Jernbaneklub – heritage rail operator, Sjælland

Steam locomotive "Tren del centenari" from 1948, in Vilanova Railway Museum

SRJ 28 Stortysken at Lenna Station (in Länna) on the Upsala-Lenna Jernväg railway

  • Dal-Västra Värmlands Järnväg – standard gauge, Värmland[12]
  • Djurgården Line (tramway) – Stockholm
  • Engelsberg-Norbergs Railway – standard gauge, Västmanland

Alishan steam train, engine no 31

Africa[edit]

South Africa[edit]

Rovos Rail train about to depart from Capital Park Station

Note that most of the heritage railway operators in South Africa have their own depots where locomotives and coaches are kept and serviced, but run on state-owned railways.

  • Atlantic Rail – day trips from Cape Town to Simonstown using steam locomotives and heritage coaching stock[30]
  • Friends of the Rail – day trips from Hermanstad (Pretoria) using steam locomotives and heritage coaching stock[31]
  • Outeniqua Choo Tjoe – heritage railway that is not currently operational[32]
  • Patons Country Narrow Gauge Railway – a two-foot narrow gauge heritage railway in KwaZulu-Natal, South Africa, from Ixopo to Umzimkhulu
  • Reefsteamers – day trips from Johannesburg to Magaliesburg and some longer disctance railtours using steam locomotives[33]
  • Rovos Rail – up-market railtours[34]
  • The Sandstone Heritage Trust – private railway operating steam locomotives[35]
  • Umgeni Steam Railway – Kloof to Inchanga, near Durban[36]

Tunisia[edit]

  • Lézard rouge
